title: Parents give mixed reaction to getting children 5 and under vaccinated
author: AUSTIN DENEAN; The National Desk
description: The latest vaccination campaign is underway in the U. S. after federal regulators approved COVID-19 shots for children 5 and under last week.
cleaned_text: Parents give mixed reaction to getting children 5 and under vaccinated by AUSTIN DENEAN | The National Desk Anna Weiser, left, and her son Henry, 4, wait in an observation room after Henry was inoculated with the first dose of the Moderna COVID-19 vaccine for children 6 months through 4 years old, Tuesday, June 21, 2022, at Montefiore Medical Group in the Bronx borough of
